track.name: Rubric
comments: i was shown this song in my music class at MSU.  now i love it
It reminds me of a gas pump.
sounds like sufjan stevens... or is it the other way around?

same here.  he was on the organ with a female vocalist.  if anybody happens to have a copy of him performing this on SNL, message me.  i've been looking for it on video websites for a long time to no avail
This is the song that forced myself to find a copy of Glassworks. I was blown away watching them on SNL do this song. With the vocals on the live performance, it had much more power.
This is the song I imagine playing when some sort of alien spaceship lands on earth.
this song rules. why no love?
